description: Description: Do you enjoy working with college students and want a career that can make impact in the lives of others? Student affairs may be the field for you! This free, online course explores foundations of the field, functional areas, guiding theories, professional organizations, and networking tips. In addition, participants will learn how student affairs professionals impact student success, as well as how to search for graduate programs and manage a successful job search!
title: Exploring the Student Affairs in Higher Education Profession
instructors: Lory-Ann Varela, Paul Shepherd and Teri Engelke
